title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
**Product Title:** BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All-in-One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black (2554A)

**Product Description:**

Take your cleaning to the next level with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All-in-One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. This innovative, cordless device combines the functions of a vacuum cleaner and mop in one convenient unit, perfect for hard floors and area rugs.

**Key Features:**

- **Multi-Surface Cleaning:** Effectively clean a variety of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs.
- **Cordless Convenience:** Enjoy up to 30 minutes of cleaning time with the 36V Lithium-Ion battery, and easily move around without being restricted by cords.
- **Rotating Brush System:** The rotating brush system picks up dirt, debris, and pet hair with ease, while the improved edge cleaning feature ensures a thorough clean along baseboards and edges.
- **Two-Tank Technology:** Separate clean water and dirt tanks make it easy to clean and maintain the device.
- **Self-Cleaning Cycle:** Keep the CrossWave clean and hygienic with the self-cleaning cycle feature.
- **WiFi Connected:** Stay connected and monitor your cleaning progress through the BISSELL Connect app.
- **Swivel Head and Carry Handle:** Easily maneuver the device with the swivel head and carry handle, making it perfect for cleaning hard-to-reach areas.
- **Supports a Good Cause:** A portion of the proceeds from this product supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to reducing pet overpopulation and supporting animal welfare.

**What's Included:**

- 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
- 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
- 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

**Product Specifications:**

- Model Number: 2554A
- Color: Black
- Cleaning Path Width: 10.5 inches
- Clean Water Tank Capacity: 28 oz
- Dirt Tank Capacity: 18.6 oz

**Order Now and Experience the Power of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All-in-One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop.**
